description: This file is a header (.h) file that declares functions and includes related to OvsDbApi, providing an interface for database operations such as initialization, deinitialization, write, monitor, cancel monitor, delete, and ID generation within an OVS (Open vSwitch) context.

methods.name: ovsdb_init
methods.description: Initializes the OVS database subsystem with a specified starting ID.

methods.name: ovsdb_deinit
methods.description: Deinitializes or cleans up the OVS database subsystem.

methods.name: ovsdb_write
methods.description: Writes data to the OVS database, with a receipt callback for confirmation.

methods.name: ovsdb_monitor
methods.description: Sets up a monitor on a specified OVS table with callback functions for monitoring events and receipts.

methods.name: ovsdb_monitor_cancel
methods.description: Cancels an existing monitor on the specified RID with a receipt callback.

methods.name: ovsdb_delete
methods.description: Deletes a key-value pair from a specified OVS table.

methods.name: id_generate
methods.description: Generates and returns a new unique ID.
